text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/participant-type

name: ParticipationTypeVS
title: Participant type
description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter
